thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Thomas Neil
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Thomas Neil

author: Thomas Neil
title: Thomas Neil
text: It took a while because several glitches that were my problem. However, Jaimee was patient while I resolved them. I didn't like the appraiser that was assigned. He was unwilling to consider any other comparables and did not take into account the value of my 1500 square foot shop in the pack yard because he couldn't find any comparables for it. Jaimee tried to assist me with the appraiser but he wouldn't even consider the other comparables I offered.
